description: Try our easy to follow Barbequed Prawns With Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Barbequed Prawns With Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g green prawns, peeled & deveined, tails on

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rice in a saucepan of boiling water for 10 minutes or until tender. Drain well.

Meanwhile, spray a small saucepan with oil and heat over medium heat. Add shallot, chilli and garlic. Cook, stirring often, for 2 minutes or until soft. Add coconut milk, bring to a simmer and cook for 3 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in half the coriander.
Combine pineapple, tomato, lime juice and remaining coriander in a small bowl. Season with freshly ground black pepper.

Heat a barbecue plate over medium-high heat. Spray prawns with oil and cook for 1-2 minutes each side or until golden and cooked through (alternatively, spray a large non-stick frying pan with oil and cook over medium-high heat).
Divide prawns, rice and salsa between serving plates. Spoon sauce over prawns to serve.
